Author: whatsupbitchezzz
Text: This is relatable AF. I've also been on a spiral with self harm and struggling not to purge this semester  Have you tried talking to a psychiatrist? I was just referred to one for depression (which, for me, gives me that exact same craving to self harm and purge, etc.), and I'm really optimistic about the results of starting antidepressants. Maybe a similar type of thing could help you as well?
